funFacts.fact: Japan has one of the highest life expectancy rates in the world, with an average of over 84 years.

The Eiffel Tower in Paris was originally intended to be a temporary structure for the 1889 World's Fair.
Canada has more lakes than any other country in the world.
Brazil is the largest producer of coffee in the world.
South Africa is home to the world's largest brewing company, SABMiller.

China is home to the world's largest population, with over 1.4 billion people.

The Olympic Games, which originated in ancient Greece, were revived in Athens in 1896.
